explains: adv. 相应地，照着；因此，所以

sentences.en: It is a difficult job and they should be paid accordingly.
sentences.cn: 它是一项艰巨的工作，他们应该相应地获得报酬。

sentences.en: The cost of materials rose sharply last year. Accordingly, we were forced to increase our prices.
sentences.cn: 去年材料成本大幅度提高，因此我们被迫加价。

sentences.en: We have a different background, a different history. Accordingly, we have the right to different futures.
sentences.cn: 我们拥有不同的背景、不同的历史。因此，我们有权获得不一样的前途。
